headline: Stifel Cautious on Twilio (TWLO) Despite Agentic AI Tailwinds
summary: Twilio Inc. (NYSE:TWLO) is one of the 10 AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On August 8, Stifel analyst J. Parker Lane reiterated a Hold rating on the stock with a $110.00 price target. headline: AI and the Empathy Gap: Finding the Balance between AI and Human First Customer Experience
summary: NEW YORK, Aug. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- While brands are celebrating AI-driven efficiency gains in customer experience (CX), a significant gap exists between their internal benefits and the often underwhelming service that consumers are actually experiencing. According to Verizon’s CX Annual Insights report, the future of CX isn't just about implementing AI, but about strategically integrating it to amplify human connections and address core customer frustrations.
